page_content:
We protect what matters.And the Journey 
Continues
“It’s humbling to realize the difference that can be  
made in the world when we work together   Behind  
our name and industry leadership, Stericycle is a team  
of talented and purpose-driven individuals   While we  
do many things that have made Stericycle successful, 
our challenge and our responsibility every day is to  
make a difference by protecting what matters  ” 
  – Charlie Alutto, Pr esident and CEO
